title: Ethereum Cat Herder Meeting #60
body:
## Date and Time

June 08, 2021, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New on ECH Discord and/or contributors introduction

### 1. [ECH website](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/155) 
- Update
- Website testing & debugging
- next steps?

### 2. Blogs & survey
- London overview blog
- [Ethereum blockchain users and developers research](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeugRHv93fizew0zeqXFOOnQIbjbWnVHoThLJR3f3g6gVvXhQ/viewform)

### 3. ECH new initiatives
- Creating a new channel at Discord "Discontinued products/clients"
- Adding resources for Beacon chain upgrade 
- Add more resources to the current ECH website for onboarding new users. 

### 4. [Peep an EIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F) 
- [Altair: Accounting reform with Alex Stokes](https://youtu.be/KdhHJa2SEwY)
- [Altair: Features special with Vitalik Buterin & Danny Ryan](https://youtu.be/iaAEGs1DMgQ)

Upcoming
- EIP- 3541 with Alex Beregszaszi, Paweł Bylica, Andrei Maiboroda on June 9th at 1830 UTC.
- EIP-1559 with Tim Beiko, Barnabé Monnot, Micah Zoltu on June 15th at 1400 UTC
- Follow more on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

### 5. Events & meetup
- [EthCC [4]](https://ethcc.io/) 

### 6. ECH funding
- Funding via ESP & Moloch

### 7. [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
- Merge implementers' meeting #5
- All Core Dev meeting [#114](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/All%20Core%20Devs%20Meetings/Meeting%20114.md) 
- Eth2 Implementers' meeting [#65](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/blob/62513df76a8888dd030a65ee496afebe482ba67d/eth2.0-implementers-calls/call_65.md)
- EIP Improvement Process meeting [#34](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/blob/master/All%20EIPIP%20Meetings/Meeting%20034.md)

### 8. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 9. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 59](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20059.md)

#### The date for the next meeting - June 22, 2021
